column4: is anyone here using ext4 ? if so if there a big improvment from ext3 ?

I am and yes  quite an improvement,   it's not quite perfect in 9.04 tough, because they don't have the later kernel,  it will be default in 9.10 for clean installs.  and people need to clean install for full support
much faster boot up  than  Ext3 for 9.04,  I noticed :)
read the stuff in release notes about Ext4
